Django ORM, Migrations, and Model Relati.description: Issues with Django models including inheritance, choices display, ordering, relationship hints, and migration generation.

HTTP and URL Handling.description: Problems in HTTP utilities and URL routing/view handling.

Internationalization and Translation Val.description: Issues in the i18n framework, including language code validation and checks.

Testing and Transaction Rollback.description: Failures in Django's testing framework related to database serialization and rollback handling.

Developer Tooling and Debugging.description: Bugs in development-time tooling such as the auto-reloader and exception reporting/sanitization.
